OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupTransAlch
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Transmutation Alchemy Ores.

OptionChoice.name: enableTransAlch
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Transmutation Alchemy ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Transmutation Alchemy ores.
Transmutation Alchemy ores will be handled by Minecraft directly.

OptionChoice.name: cleanUpTransAlch
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation use the Substitution Pass to remove all instances of Transmutation Alchemy ore from the world? If the mod's oregen can be turned off in its configuration, then it's recommended to do so, as the substitution pass can slow the game significantly. If this option is disabled without disabling the mod's own ore generation, you'll end up with two oregens working at once, flooding the world with ore. Enabled by default to ensure the ores are completely removed.

Choice.description: Use the substitution pass to clean up Transmutation Alchemy ores.
Transmutation Alchemy ores do not need to be cleaned up by a substitution pass.

OptionChoice.name: tralchPowerCrystalDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Power Crystal is generated

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Power Crystal is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: tralchPowerCrystalFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Transmutation Alchemy Power Crystal distributions

OptionNumeric.name: tralchPowerCrystalSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Transmutation Alchemy Power Crystal distributions

OptionChoice.name: tralchProtectionCrystalDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Protection Crystal is generated

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Protection Crystal is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: tralchProtectionCrystalFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Transmutation Alchemy Protection Crystal distributions

OptionNumeric.name: tralchProtectionCrystalSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Transmutation Alchemy Protection Crystal distributions

OptionChoice.name: tralchMindCrystalDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mind Crystal is generated

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mind Crystal is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: tralchMindCrystalFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Transmutation Alchemy Mind Crystal distributions

OptionNumeric.name: tralchMindCrystalSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Transmutation Alchemy Mind Crystal distributions

Substitute.name: tralchOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Substitute.name: tralchNetherBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Substitute.name: tralchEndBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Cloud.name: tralchPowerCrystalStrata
Cloud.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore. Primarily, this distribution is meant to provide realistic distribution of stone in a strata formation.

Veins.name: tralchPowerCrystalVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Cloud.name: tralchPowerCrystalCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi- permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: tralchPowerCrystalHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

StandardGen.name: tralchPowerCrystalStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
